48 006 015	For neither is circumcision anything nor uncircumcision , but a new creation .
48 006 016	All who walk by this rule — may peace and mercy be on them , and on the Israel of God !
48 006 017	For the future let no one trouble me ; for I bear on my body the brands of Jesus .
48 006 018	The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirits , brethren . Amen .
49 001 001	PAUL , an apostle of Christ Jesus by the will of God , to the Holy who are at Ephesus , faithful in Christ Jesus :
49 001 002	Grace and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ !
49 001 003	Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly heights in Christ ,
49 001 004	even as he chose us in him before the foundation of the world to be holy and spotless before him in love .
49 001 005	He predestined us to recognition as sons to himself through Jesus Christ according to the kindness of his will ,
49 001 006	to the praise of his glorious grace which he bestowed on us in the Beloved ,
49 001 007	in whom we have redemption through his blood , the forgiveness of our sins , according to the wealth of his loving kindness
49 001 008	which he made to abound toward us in all wisdom and understanding .
49 001 009	He has made known to us the mystery of his will according to his grace which he purposed in him
49 001 010	for the government of the fullness of the ages , to bring to unity all things in Christ , both things in the heavens and things on the earth .
49 001 011	In him we were predestined according to the plan of him who works in all things according to the purpose of his will ,
49 001 012	and we were made God's heritage in order that we might bring praise to his glory — we who first have fixed our hope on Christ .
49 001 013	In him you also , after hearing the message of the truth , the good news of your salvation , and putting your faith in him , were sealed by the promised Holy Spirit ,
49 001 014	which is the pledge of our inheritance in anticipation of the full redemption of God's own people to the praise of his glory .
49 001 015	For this reason I also , since hearing of your faith in Jesus and your love to all the saints ,
49 001 016	never cease giving thanks for you when I mention you in my prayers ,
49 001 017	that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Father most glorious , may give to you a spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of himself ,
49 001 018	enlightening the eyes of your heart , that you may know what is the hope of his calling , and what the glorious wealth of his inheritance in the holy ,
49 001 019	and what the surpassing greatness of his power toward us who believe according to the inworking of his vast might ,
49 001 020	which he put forth in Christ when he raised him from the dead and made him sit at his own right hand in the heavenly heights ,
49 001 021	far above every archangel and authority and power and lordship and every name that is named not only in this world but also in the world to come .
49 001 022	He put all things under his feet and placed him as head over all for the church ,
49 001 023	which is his body , the fullness of him who fills all in all .
49 002 001	YOU also God raised to life when you were dead in misdeeds and sins
49 002 002	in which you once walked , following the ways of this age of the world , led by the Ruler of the power of the air , the spirit who now works in the sons of disobedience .
49 002 003	Among these we all lived once in the passions of our flesh and of our thoughts , and we were by nature children of wrath like the rest .
49 002 004	But God , who is rich in mercy , because of his great love with which he loved us ,
49 002 005	even when we were dead in misdeeds , made us alive along with Christ — by grace we have been saved —
49 002 006	and raised us up with him and made us sit with him in the heavenly heights in Christ Jesus ,
49 002 007	that he might show in the ages to come the surpassing richness of his grace in his kindness to us in Christ Jesus .
49 002 008	For by grace you have been saved through faith , and that not of yourselves ; it is the gift of God ,
49 002 009	not of works , that no one may boast .
49 002 010	For we are his work , formed in Christ Jesus for good works in which God had prepared beforehand to have us live .
49 002 011	Therefore remember that once you were Gentiles in the flesh and were called uncircumcision by the so-called circumcision in the flesh , made by hands ,
49 002 012	and that you were then apart from Christ , aliens from the commonwealth of Israel and strangers to the covenants of promise , without hope and without God in the world .
49 002 013	But now in Christ Jesus you who once were far have become near by the blood of Christ .
49 002 014	For he is our peace . He has made both Jew and Gentile one and has broken down the dividing wall , the enmity .
49 002 015	In his own flesh he has ended the force of the law of commandments in ordinances in order to make the two , in himself , into one new man , thus making peace ,
49 002 016	and in order to reconcile both in one body to God through his cross , by slaying the enmity by it .
49 002 017	And he came and brought the good news of peace to you who were far and peace to those who were near .
49 002 018	For through him we , both Jews and Gentiles , have access through one Spirit to the Father .
49 002 019	So then you are no longer strangers and resident aliens , but fellow citizens with the holy and members of the household of God ,
49 002 020	built on the foundation of the apostles and prophets , Jesus Christ himself being the corner stone .
49 002 021	In him all the building , framed together , is growing into a holy temple in the Lord ,
49 002 022	in whom you also are being built for a dwelling of God in the Spirit .
49 003 001	FOR this reason I , Paul , the prisoner of Christ Jesus for the sake of you Gentiles , —
49 003 002	if you have heard of the gracious commission which God has given me to you ,
49 003 003	that by revelation the mystery has been disclosed to me , as I wrote before briefly ,
49 003 004	In reading that letter you can learn my understanding in the mystery of Christ ,
49 003 005	a mystery which was not disclosed in other generations to the sons of men as it has now been revealed to his holy apostles and prophets by the Spirit ,
49 003 006	namely , that the Gentiles are fellow heirs and fellow members of the body , fellow sharers of the promise in Christ Jesus through the good news ,
49 003 007	of which I became a servant according to the free grace of God which was given me by the inworking of his power .
49 003 008	To me , the least of all the holy , has this grace been given , to proclaim to the Gentiles the good news of the unsearchable riches of Christ
49 003 009	and to show what is the working of the mystery which has been hidden for ages in God , who created all things
49 003 010	in order to disclose now to the archangels and powers in the heavenly heights , through the church , the varied wisdom of God ,
49 003 011	according to the eternal purpose which he has accomplished by Christ Jesus our Lord ,
49 003 012	in whom we have boldness and confident access through faith in him .
49 003 013	So I beg you not to lose heart because of the distresses that come on me for your sake . They are a high honor to you .
49 003 014	For this reason I bow my knees to the Father
49 003 015	from whom every family in heaven and on earth is named ,
49 003 016	that he may grant to you according to his glorious wealth to be strengthened with might through his Spirit in the inner man ,
49 003 017	that Christ may dwell in your hearts through faith , and that you , rooted and founded in love ,
49 003 018	may be able with all the holy to comprehend what is the breadth and length and height and depth —
49 003 019	yes , to know the love of Christ , which yet surpasses knowledge , and may be filled with all the fullness of God .
49 003 020	To him who is able to do far beyond all we ask or think by the power that works in us ,
49 003 021	to him be glory in the church and in Christ Jesus through all the generations of the ages ! Amen .
49 004 001	I , THE prisoner of the Lord , beg you , then , to live worthily of the calling with which you have been called ,
49 004 002	with all modesty and gentleness , being slow to anger , bearing with one another in love ,
49 004 003	earnest in keeping the unity of the Spirit in the bond of peace .
49 004 004	There is one body and one Spirit , just as you were called with one hope that belongs to your calling ,
49 004 005	one Lord , one faith , one baptism ,
49 004 006	one God and Father of all , who is over all and through all and in all .

49 004 014	Then we shall be no longer children tossed and borne about by every wind of teaching through the trickery of men and craftiness in the devices of deceit ,
49 004 015	but speaking the truth in love we shall grow wholly into him who is the head , Christ ,
49 004 016	from whom the whole body framed together and strengthened by what every joint supplies vigorously , in the measure of each , makes growth in building itself up in love .
49 004 017	This then I say and solemnly protest in the Lord : that you are no longer to live as the Gentiles live in vacancy of mind ,
49 004 018	having their understanding darkened , aliens from the life of God because of the ignorance that is in them , and because of the hardness of their hearts .
49 004 019	Lost to any sense of shame they have abandoned themselves to sensuality for the practice of every kind of impurity with greediness .
49 004 020	But you have not so learned Christ ,
49 004 021	if you have heard him and have been taught in him as the truth is in Jesus ,
49 004 022	that you should put away the old man who belonged to your former way of life and was perishing in deluding passions ,
49 004 023	and that you should be made new in the spirit of your minds
49 004 024	and put on the new man formed as God approves in the righteousness and holiness of truth .
49 004 025	Therefore put aside lying and speak truth every one to his neighbor , for we are members one of another .
49 004 026	" Be angry and do not sin . " Do not let the sun go down on your wrath ,
49 004 027	neither give place for the Devil .
49 004 028	He who steals must steal no longer , but rather he must labor , working with his own hands something good , so as to have something to share with any one in need .
49 004 029	Let no vile word come out of your mouth , but , if anything , a good word for needed upbuilding of character to give grace to those who hear .
49 004 030	Do not grieve the Holy Spirit of God by whom you have been sealed for the day of redemption .
49 004 031	Let all bitterness and anger and wrath and clamor and abusive language be put away from you with every kind of malice .
49 004 032	Be kind to one another , sympathetic , forgiving one another just as God in Christ has forgiven you .
49 005 001	BE imitators of God as beloved children
49 005 002	and live in love , as Christ loved us and gave himself for us , an offering and sacrifice to God yielding a fragrant odor .
49 005 003	Unchastity or any kind of impurity or greediness must not be mentioned among you , as befits holy people ;
49 005 004	nor should there be indecent and foolish talk or jesting , which are unbecoming , but rather thanksgiving .

49 005 006	Let no one deceive you with empty words ; for because of these things the wrath of God comes on the sons of disobedience .
49 005 007	Do not , then , be partakers with them .
49 005 008	For you were once darkness , but now you are light in the Lord . Live like children of light —
49 005 009	for the fruit of light appears in all generosity and righteousness and truth —
49 005 010	testing what is pleasing to the Lord ,
49 005 011	and have no fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness , but rather reprove them ,
49 005 012	for the things that they do in secret it is shameful even to speak of .
49 005 013	But all things when reproved are shown truly by the light , for everything shown truly is light .
49 005 014	Therefore it says , " Wake , O sleeper , and rise from the dead and Christ will give you light . "
49 005 015	Be strictly careful , then , how you live , not as unwise but as wise .
49 005 016	Buy up the opportunity , because these are evil days .
49 005 017	Therefore do not be thoughtless , but understand what is the Lord's will .
49 005 018	Do not be drunk with wine , in which there is profligacy , but be full of the Spirit ,
49 005 019	speaking to one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs , singing and playing the harp heartily to the Lord ,
49 005 020	giving thanks always for all things in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ to God the Father .
49 005 021	Be subject to one another in reverence for Christ ,
49 005 022	wives to their own husbands as in the Lord ,
49 005 023	because a man is the head of his wife as Christ is the head of the church and he is the savior of the body .
49 005 024	But as the church is subject to Christ , so wives are to their husbands in everything .
49 005 025	Husbands , love your wives , as Christ also loved the church and gave himself for it ,
49 005 026	that he might make it holy , cleansing it by the washing with water according to his word ,
49 005 027	that he might present to himself the church glorious , without spot or wrinkle or any such thing , but holy and faultless .
49 005 028	Thus ought men to love their own wives as their own bodies . He who loves his own wife loves himself ,
49 005 029	for no one ever hates his own flesh , but nourishes and cherishes it , just as Christ does the church ,
49 005 030	for we are members of his body .
49 005 031	" Therefore shall a man leave his father and his mother and shall cleave to his wife and the two shall become one flesh .
49 005 032	" This mystery is great , but I am speaking of Christ and the church .
49 005 033	But each one of you must love his own wife as himself , and the wife must reverence her husband .
49 006 001	CHILDREN , obey your parents in the Lord , for this is right .
49 006 002	" Honor your father and your mother . " This is the first commandment with a promise ,
49 006 003	" That it may go well with you and you may be long-lived in the land . "
49 006 004	And you , fathers , do not irritate your children , but bring them up in the education and admonition of the Lord .
49 006 005	Slaves , obey those who according to the flesh are your masters , with reverence and awe in singleness of your hearts as to Christ ,
49 006 006	not with eye service as pleasers of men , but as Christ's slaves , doing the will of God in a whole-souled way ,
49 006 007	giving service with cheerfulness as to the Lord and not to men ,
49 006 008	knowing that whatever good thing each one does that he will be rewarded for by the Lord , whether he be slave or free .
49 006 009	And you , masters , do the same by them , avoiding threats , knowing that the Master both of them and of you is in the heavens , and there is no partiality for rank with him .
49 006 010	To conclude : Be strong in the Lord and in the power of his might .
49 006 011	Put on the complete armor of God so that you may be able to stand against the cunning arts of the Devil .

49 006 012	For our wrestling is not against flesh and blood , but against the arch-angels , against the authorities , against the world-rulers of this darkness , against spiritual forces of wickedness in the heavenly heights .
49 006 013	Therefore take the complete armor of God , that you may be able to withstand in the evil day and , after going through everything , to stand .
49 006 014	Stand , then , belted with truth , wearing the breastplate of righteousness ,
49 006 015	shod with the readiness of the good news of peace .
49 006 016	In every event take up the shield of faith by which you will be able to quench all the fiery darts of the Evil One ,
49 006 017	and accept the helmet of salvation and the sword of the Spirit , which is the word of God .
49 006 018	Pray at all times in the Spirit with all manner of prayer and entreaty ; be awake to this with all intentness and with prayer for all the holy
49 006 019	and in my behalf , that words may be given to me when I open my month to make known with fearlessness the mystery of the good news ,
49 006 020	for which I am an ambassador in chains , that I may tell it fearlessly as I ought .

49 006 022	whom I am sending to you for this very purpose , will tell you everything , so that you may know the news of me and he may encourage your hearts .
49 006 023	Peace to the brethren and love with faith from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ !
49 006 024	Grace be with all who love our Lord Jesus Christ with undying love !
50 001 001	PAUL and Timothy , servants of Christ Jesus , to all the Holy in Christ Jesus who are in Philippi , with Bishops and Deacons :
50 001 002	Grace be to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
50 001 003	I thank my God for all your remembrance of me ,
50 001 004	always in every prayer of mine for you all making request with joy
50 001 005	for your fellowship in spreading the good news from the first day until now ,
50 001 006	being confident of this very thing , that he who has begun the good work in you will carry it on to completion on the day of Christ Jesus .
50 001 007	So it is right for me to think of you all , because you have me in your hearts , and in my chains and in my defense and in establishing the good news you are all sharers in my privilege .
50 001 008	For God is my witness how much I long for you all in the affections of Christ Jesus .
50 001 009	And this is my prayer that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and all insight ,
50 001 010	so that you may discriminate between the things that differ , that you may be pure and blameless in the day of Christ ,
50 001 011	filled with the fruit of knowledge through Jesus Christ to the glory and praise of God .
50 001 012	I wish you to know , brethren , that my affairs have turned out rather to the furtherance of the good news ,
50 001 013	so that my chains have become well known as for Christ to the whole Praetorian Guard and to all the rest ,
50 001 014	and the most of the brethren in the Lord , made confident by my chains , are unusually brave in speaking the message fearlessly .
50 001 015	Some indeed proclaim Christ because of envy and rivalry , some also because of good will .
50 001 016	Some announce Christ from love , knowing that I am placed for the defense of the good news ,
50 001 017	but others out of partisanship , thinking to add distress to my chains .
50 001 018	What then ? Still in every way , whether in pretense or in truth , Christ is proclaimed and in that I rejoice , yes , and will rejoice .
50 001 019	For I know that this will make for my salvation through your prayer and the supply of the Spirit of Jesus Christ ,

50 001 020	according to my earnest expectation and hope that I may be put to shame in nothing , but with all courage , as always , so now Christ may be honored in my body , whether by my life or by my death .
50 001 021	For to me to live is Christ and to die is gain .
50 001 022	If it is to be life in the flesh , that means fruitful work for me . I know not which to choose .
50 001 023	I am under pressure both ways , having the desire to depart and be with Christ , for it is far better ,
50 001 024	yet that I should stay in the flesh is more needful on your account .
50 001 025	And this I confidently know , that I shall stay and stay near you all for your advancement and joy of faith ,
50 001 026	that your exultation in Christ Jesus may overflow on my account , because of my presence again with you .

50 001 027	Only exercise your citizenship in a manner worthy of the good news of Christ , so that , whether I come and see you or in absence hear news of you , I may know that you are standing in one spirit , with one mind wrestling in the faith of the good news
50 001 028	and not frightened in anything by your adversaries , which for them is a sign of ruin , but for you of salvation , and that from God ;
50 001 029	because it has been graciously allowed you not only to believe in Christ but also to suffer for his sake ,
50 001 030	and you have the same struggle that you saw in me and now hear of in me .
50 002 001	IF there is any encouragement in Christ , any persuasive power in love , any fellowship in the Spirit , any sympathies and compassions ,
50 002 002	fill up my joy by having the same love , being of the same mind , thinking the same thing ,
50 002 003	doing nothing in a partisan or vainglorious way , but each modestly regarding the others as of more account than himself .
50 002 004	Do not be each intent on his own interests , but also on the interests of others .
50 002 005	Let this mind be in you which was also in Christ Jesus ,
50 002 006	who , though he was in the form of God , did not think that equality with God was something to be grasped ,
50 002 007	but emptied himself , taking the form of a servant and coming into the likeness of men ,
50 002 008	and when found in the condition of a man he humbled himself by becoming obedient even to death — death on the cross .
50 002 009	Therefore , God has highly exalted him and has graciously given him the name which is above every name ,
50 002 010	that at the name of Jesus every knee may bow , of beings in heaven and those on earth and those under the earth ,
50 002 011	and every tongue confess that Jesus Christ is Lord , to the glory of God the Father .
50 002 012	So then , my beloved , as you have always obeyed , not in my presence only , but now much more in my absence , work out your own salvation with reverence and awe .
50 002 013	For it is God who is working in you both the willing and the doing because of his kindness .
50 002 014	Do everything without murmurings or disputings
50 002 015	that you may be blameless and pure , children of God , spotless in the midst of a crooked and perverse generation among whom you shine as lights in the world ,
50 002 016	holding forth the message of life , so that on the day of Christ I can boast that I did not run in vain or labor in vain .
50 002 017	But if I am poured out as a libation on your sacrificial offering of faith , I rejoice and share the joy of you all .
50 002 018	In the same way you must rejoice and share my joy .
50 002 019	But I hope in the Lord Jesus to send Timothy to you soon , that I may be cheered by knowing about you .
50 002 020	For I have no one likeminded with him who will so sincerely care for your interests .
50 002 021	For all pursue their own aims , not those of Christ Jesus .
50 002 022	But you know how he has been tested and how like a child with a father he has served with me in spreading the good news .
50 002 023	So I hope to send him at once when I see how my affairs are going .
50 002 024	And I trust in the Lord that I myself shall come quickly .
50 002 025	I think it necessary to send to you Epaphroditus , my brother and fellow worker and fellow soldier , and your messenger and minister to my needs ,
50 002 026	since he longs for you all and is troubled because you have heard that he was sick .
50 002 027	Indeed he was sick and near to death . But God had mercy on him , and not on him alone , but also on me , that I might not have sorrow upon sorrow .
50 002 028	I send him the more readily that you may see him and rejoice again and I be less sorrowful .
50 002 029	Receive him in the Lord with all joy and hold such men in honor ,
50 002 030	because for the work of Christ he was near to death , hazarding his life to complete the service you were not here to do for me .
50 003 001	TO conclude , my brethren : rejoice in the Lord . To repeat to you the same things is not tiresome to me and it is safe for you .
50 003 002	Beware of the dogs , beware of the bad workmen , beware of the excision .
50 003 003	For we are the circumcision , we who worship in the Spirit of God and exult in Christ Jesus , and have no confidence in the flesh ,
50 003 004	though I have ground for confidence even in the flesh . If any other man thinks that he has ground for confidence in the flesh , I have more —
50 003 005	circumcised the eighth day , of the race of Israel , of the tribe of Benjamin , a Hebrew of Hebrews , as to the Law a Pharisee ,
50 003 006	as to zeal persecuting the church , as to the righteousness of the Law blameless .
50 003 007	But the things that were gain to me , those I have counted loss for Christ .

50 003 008	Yes , I count all to be loss because of the surpassing worth of the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord , for whom I have suffered the loss of all things and count them but refuse , that I may gain Christ
50 003 009	and be found in him , not having my own righteousness that was from the Law , but that which is through faith in Christ , the righteousness which comes from God and rests on faith ,
50 003 010	that I may know him and the power of his resurrection and the fellowship of his sufferings , becoming like him in death ,
50 003 011	if possibly I may attain to the resurrection from the dead .
50 003 012	Not that I have already obtained it or have already been made perfect , but I press on to lay hold of that for which I was laid hold of by Christ Jesus .
50 003 013	Brethren , I do not consider myself yet to have laid hold of it . But one thing I do : forgetting what is behind and stretching forward to what is in front
50 003 014	I press toward the goal for the prize of the heavenly call of God in Christ Jesus .
50 003 015	Let us all who are full grown think in this way . If in anything you think differently , even that God will reveal to you ,
50 003 016	but so far as we have attained let us walk in the same path .
50 003 017	Unite in imitating me , brethren , and watch those who are living according to our example .
50 003 018	For many are living as I used often to tell you and now say even weeping that they are enemies of the cross of Christ .
50 003 019	Their end is ruin , their God is their stomach , their glory is in their shame , they think earthly thoughts .
50 003 020	For the state of which we are citizens is in the heavens and from there we are expecting a Savior , the Lord Jesus Christ .
50 003 021	He will transform the body we have in our low estate into the likeness of the body he has in glory by the power by which he can subject all things to himself .
50 004 001	SO , my brethren beloved and longed for , my joy and crown , stand firm thus in the Lord , beloved .
50 004 002	I beg Euodia and I beg Syntyche to be of the same mind in the Lord .

50 004 003	Yes , I ask you , true yokefellow , help them , since they struggled in spreading the good news along with me and Clement and the rest of my fellow workers whose names are in the book of life .
50 004 004	Rejoice in the Lord always . Again I say rejoice .
50 004 005	Let your fairness be known to all men . The Lord is near .
50 004 006	Do not worry , but in everything by prayer and entreaty with thanksgiving let your requests be made known to God .
50 004 007	And the peace of God which passes all understanding will guard your hearts and your thoughts in Christ Jesus .

50 004 008	To conclude , brethren , whatever is true , whatever is dignified , whatever is just , whatever is pure , whatever is lovable , whatever is highly spoken of — if there is any virtue or any praise — think of that .
50 004 009	What you learned and accepted and heard and saw in me — practice that . And the God of peace will be with you .
50 004 010	I rejoiced in the Lord greatly that now at length your thoughtfulness for me had revived . You were thoughtful for me all along , but lacked opportunity .
50 004 011	Not that I am speaking because of want ; for I have learned how to be content in whatever circumstances I am .

50 004 012	I know how to live humbly and I know how to enjoy abundance . In each and every situation I have been initiated into the secret both of being well fed and of going hungry , both of having abundance and of bearing want .
50 004 013	I can do all things through him who gives me strength .
50 004 014	Yet you did nobly in sharing with me in my distress .
50 004 015	You Philippians know that at the beginning of the good news , when I came away from Macedonia , no church shared with me in the matter of giving and receiving except you only ,
50 004 016	and that in Thessalonica you sent once , yes , twice , for my need .
50 004 017	Not that I am seeking for the gift , but I am seeking for the fruit that increases to your credit .

50 004 019	My God will supply every need of yours according to his wealth in glory in Christ Jesus .
50 004 020	To God our Father be glory for the ages of the ages ! Amen .
50 004 021	Greet every holy one in Christ Jesus . The brethren with me send greetings to you .
50 004 022	All the holy send greetings to you , especially those of Caesar's household .
50 004 023	The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirits !
51 001 001	PAUL , an apostle of Christ Jesus by the will of God , and Timothy our brother ,
51 001 002	to the holy and faithful brethren in Christ in Colossae : Grace be to you and peace from God our Father !
51 001 003	We always thank God , the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , in praying for you ,
51 001 004	because we have heard of your faith in Christ Jesus and the love that you have to all the holy
51 001 005	because of the hope laid up for us in heaven . Of this you have already heard in the true message of the good news
51 001 006	which has come to you . Just as in all the world it is bearing fruit and growing , so also it is among you since the day that you heard and learned of the grace of God in truth .
51 001 007	So you learned it from Epaphras , our beloved fellow servant , who is a faithful servant of Christ in your behalf ,
51 001 008	and who has told us of your love in the Spirit .
51 001 009	For this reason we also , from the day we heard it , never cease praying for you and asking that you may have full knowledge of his will in all wisdom and spiritual insight ,
51 001 010	and that you may live lives worthy of the Lord and please him in every way . May you bear fruit in every good work and grow in the knowledge of God .
51 001 011	May you be strengthened with all strength according to his glorious power , so as to have all patience and endurance .
51 001 012	May you joyfully give thanks to the Father who has made you fit to share in the inheritance of the holy in light .
51 001 013	He has saved us from the power of darkness and transferred us into the kingdom of his beloved Son ,
51 001 014	in whom we have redemption , the forgiveness of our sins .
51 001 015	He is the image of the invisible God , the first born of all creation ;

51 001 016	for in him were created all things in heaven and on earth , both visible and invisible , whether thrones or lordships or archangels or powers — all things have been created through him and for him ,
51 001 017	and he is before all things and in him all things unite .
51 001 018	And he is the head of the body , the church . He is the beginning , the firstborn from the dead , that he may be first in all things ,
51 001 019	because it pleased God to have all his fullness dwell in him
51 001 020	and to reconcile all things to himself through him , making peace through the blood of his cross — all things , I say , whether on earth or in heaven .
51 001 021	And you who were once alienated and enemies in your minds , living in wicked works , he has reconciled
51 001 022	by his body of flesh through death , to present you holy and spotless and blameless before him ,

51 001 023	if you remain in the faith , firm and steadfast , never moving from the hope of the good news which you have heard and which has been proclaimed in all the creation under heaven , and of which I , Paul , became a servant .
51 001 024	Now I rejoice in what I suffer for your sake , and in my turn am filling up in my flesh what was lacking in the afflictions of Christ for the sake of his body , that is , the church .
51 001 025	I became a servant of the church according to the commission from God given to me for you , to deliver fully God's message ,
51 001 026	the mystery hidden for ages and generations but now made plain to his holy ones ,
51 001 027	to whom God willed to make known what is the glorious wealth of this mystery among the Gentiles , which is Christ in you the hope of glory .
51 001 028	And we are announcing him , warning every man and teaching every man in all wisdom in order that we may present every man complete in Christ .
51 001 029	For this also I labor , wrestling with the energy of him who works powerfully within me .
51 002 001	FOR I wish you to know how I am wrestling for you and for those in Laodicea and for all who have not seen my face in the flesh ,

51 002 002	that your hearts may be encouraged and that joined together in love you may reach all the wealth of the full assurance of insight into the knowledge of the mystery of God , which is Christ .
51 002 003	In him all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge lie hidden .
51 002 004	I say this that no one may deceive you by plausible arguments .
51 002 005	For even though I am absent in the flesh , yet in the spirit I am with you , rejoicing to see your good order and the firmness of your faith in Christ .
51 002 006	Since , then , you have received Christ Jesus as Lord , live in him ,
51 002 007	rooted and built up in him , growing strong in the faith as you have been taught , and overflowing with thanksgiving .

51 002 008	Beware that no one carries you away captive by his philosophy and empty deceit according to the tradition of men , according to the elementary teachings of the world and not according to Christ .
51 002 009	For in him dwells all the fullness of God in bodily form ,
51 002 010	and you have been filled in him . He is the head of every archangel and authority .
51 002 011	In him you were circumcised with a circumcision not done by hands , by laying aside your fleshly body in the circumcision of Christ .
51 002 012	You were buried with him in baptism and raised again through faith in the inworking of God who raised him from the dead .
51 002 013	You who were dead in your sins and in the uncircumcision of your flesh God has made alive with him , and has forgiven us all our sins .
51 002 014	He erased the writing that was against us in the rules , the writing that was opposed to us . He has taken it out of the way by nailing it to his cross .
51 002 015	He despoiled the archangels and authorities and fearlessly made an example of them when he triumphed over them on the cross .
51 002 016	Let no one then judge you in the matter of food or drink or in regard to a festival or new moon or Sabbath .
51 002 017	These were a shadow of coming things , but the body is Christ's .

51 002 018	Let no one as umpire defraud you of your prize , if he delights in excessive humility and ceremonial worship of the angels , searching into his own visions , emptily puffed up by his fleshly mind
51 002 019	and not holding to the Head , from whom the whole body , supplied and held together by joints and bands , grows as God gives it growth .
51 002 020	If you died with Christ to the elementary teachings of the world , why do you , as if still living in the world , have such rules as ,
51 002 021	" Do not touch , " " Do not taste , " " Do not handle "
51 002 022	referring to things that perish when used ?

51 002 023	These rules follow the commandments and teachings of men . They have an appearance of wisdom in self-imposed ceremonial and excessive humility and severity to the body , but have no value against the indulgence of the flesh .
51 003 001	IF then you have been raised with Christ , seek the things above , where Christ is sitting at the right hand of God .
51 003 002	Have your minds on the things above and not on the things on the earth .
51 003 003	For you have died and your life is hidden with Christ in God .
51 003 004	When Christ , our life , appears , then you also will appear with him in glory .
51 003 005	Treat the members of your earthly bodies as dead — dead to unchastity , impurity , passion , evil desire , and avarice , which is idolatry .
51 003 006	On account of these things comes the wrath of God .
51 003 007	To them you also were once habituated when you lived in them .
51 003 008	But now you also must put away all wrath , anger , malice , abusive language . Vile talk must not be in your mouths .
51 003 009	Do not lie to one another . You have stripped off the old self with his practices
51 003 010	and have clothed yourselves with the new self , which is being renewed into knowledge in the image of its Creator .
51 003 011	Here there is no Greek or Jew , circumcision or uncircumcision , barbarian , Scythian , slave or freeman , but Christ is all and in all .
51 003 012	Put on , then , as the chosen of God , holy and beloved , sympathies , compassions , kindness , humility , gentleness , slowness to anger ,
51 003 013	bearing with one another and forgiving one another , if any one has a grievance against any . Just as the Lord forgave you , so must you forgive .
51 003 014	Above all these , clothe yourselves with love , which is the perfect bond of union .
51 003 015	Let the peace of Christ be umpire in your hearts . For this you were called into one body . And be thankful .
51 003 016	The message of Christ must dwell in you richly , as you teach in all wisdom and admonish one another with psalms and hymns and spiritual songs and sing with grace in your hearts to God .
51 003 017	And whatever you do in word or deed , do all in the name of the Lord Jesus , giving thanks to God the Father through him .
51 003 018	Wives , be in subjection to your husbands , as is fitting in the Lord .
51 003 019	Husbands , love your wives and do not be harsh toward them .
51 003 020	Children , obey your parents in everything , for this is pleasing in the Lord .
51 003 021	Fathers , do not irritate your children , for they may lose heart .
51 003 022	Slaves , obey in everything your masters in the flesh , not with eye-service as men-pleasers , but in sincerity of heart , because you reverence the Lord .
51 003 023	Whatever you do , do it heartily as for the Lord and not for men ,
51 003 024	for you know that from the Lord you will receive the reward of the inheritance . You are slaves to the Lord Christ .
51 003 025	He who does wrong will be repaid for the wrong he has done , and there is no partiality .
51 004 001	MASTERS , give to your slaves what is just and equal , for you know that you have a Master in heaven .
51 004 002	Be earnest and constant in prayer . Be thankfully watchful in it .
51 004 003	Pray along with us and for us that God may open for us a door for the message , so that I may tell the mystery of Christ for the sake of which I am in chains —
51 004 004	so that I may make it clear , as I ought .

51 004 006	Let what you say be always with grace , seasoned with salt . Know how you should answer each one .

51 004 009	And with him I am sending Onesimus , the faithful and beloved brother , who is one of you . They will tell you all about affairs here .
