59 001 001	JAMES , a servant of God and of the Lord Jesus Christ , to the Twelve Tribes which are scattered in foreign lands : Greeting .
59 001 002	Think it all joy , my brethren , when you fall into all sorts of trials ,
59 001 003	since you know that the testing of your faith brings out endurance .
59 001 004	Let endurance do its complete work , that you may be complete and perfect , lacking in nothing .
59 001 005	If any one of you is lacking in wisdom , let him ask it from God , who gives to all freely without reproaching , and it will be given to him .
59 001 006	But he must ask in faith with never a doubt . For he who doubts is like a wave of the sea , driven by the wind and tossed .
59 001 007	For that man must not think that he will obtain anything from the Lord —
59 001 008	a two-minded man unsteady in all his ways .
59 001 009	Let the lowly brother glory in his high station ,
59 001 010	and let the rich brother glory in his lowly station , for he will pass away like a flower of the grass .
59 001 011	For the sun rises with scorching heat and dries up the grass , and the flower of it falls and the beauty of its face perishes . So shall the rich man wither in his pursuits .
59 001 012	Blessed is the man who endures trial , for when he has been tested he will gain the crown of life which the Lord has promised to those who love him .
59 001 013	No one must say when tempted , " My temptation comes from God . " For God cannot be tempted by evil , and he tempts no one .
59 001 014	Every one is tempted when he is drawn away by his own passions and enticed .
59 001 015	Then when passion has conceived it gives birth to sin , and sin , when it is full grown , gives birth to death .
59 001 016	Make no mistake , my beloved brethren ,
59 001 017	every good gift and every perfect boon is from above ; it descends from the Father of lights , with whom there is no change or shadow caused by turning .
59 001 018	Of his own will he made us his children through the message of truth , so that we might be a sort of first fruits of his creatures .
59 001 019	I wish you to know this , my beloved brethren : Every man must be quick to hear , but slow to speak , slow to anger .
59 001 020	For a man's anger does not work out God's righteousness .
59 001 021	So lay aside all that is vile and all that remains of malice , and receive with gentleness the implanted message which can save your souls .
59 001 022	Become doers of the message and not hearers only , deceiving your own selves .
59 001 023	For if one is a hearer of the message and not a doer , he is like a man who looks at his natural face in a mirror .
59 001 024	He looks at himself and is gone , and immediately forgets what sort of man he was .
59 001 025	But he who looks earnestly into the perfect law of liberty and continues to do so , and becomes not a forgetful hearer but a doer of work — that man will be blessed in what he does .
59 001 026	If any one thinks himself religious while he does not bridle his tongue , but deceives his own heart , that man's religion is worthless .
59 001 027	Pure and stainless religion in the sight of God the Father is to visit orphans and widows in their trouble and to keep one's self unspotted from the world .
59 002 001	MY brethren , do not hold the faith of our glorious Lord Jesus Christ with partiality for persons .
59 002 002	For if there comes into your assembly a man with gold rings and in fine clothes , and there comes in a poor man in soiled clothes ,
59 002 003	and you look up to the man who is wearing the fine clothes and say , " Take this good seat , " and say to the poor man , " Stand there , " or " Sit under my footstool , "
59 002 004	are you not making distinctions in your own minds and have you not become judges with wicked thoughts ?
59 002 005	Listen , my beloved brethren , did not God choose the poor of this world to be rich in faith and heirs of the kingdom which he has promised to those who love him ?
59 002 006	But you have dishonored the poor man . Do not the rich oppress you and drag you before courts ?
59 002 007	Do they not speak profanely of the noble name by which you are called ?
59 002 008	If you keep the royal law according to the Scripture , " Thou shalt love thy neighbor as thyself , " you do well .
59 002 009	But if you have partiality , you commit sin and are convicted by the law as law-breakers .
59 002 010	For he who keeps the whole law , but stumbles in one point , has become guilty of all .
59 002 011	For he who said , " Thou shalt not commit adultery , " said also , " Thou shalt not commit murder . " If you do not commit adultery , but do commit murder , you have become a law-breaker .
59 002 012	So speak and so act as those who are soon to be judged by a law of liberty .
59 002 013	For judgment is merciless to him who has shown no mercy . Mercy triumphs over judgment .
59 002 014	Of what use is it , my brethren , for any one to say that he has faith , if he has not works ? Can faith save him ?
59 002 015	If a brother or sister is naked and lacks food for the day
59 002 016	and one of you says to them , " Go in peace , be warmed and fed , " but you do not give them what the body needs , what is the good of it ?
59 002 017	Just so faith by itself , if it has no works , is dead .
59 002 018	But some one will say , " You have faith and I have works . Show me your faith without your works and I will show you my faith by my works . "
59 002 019	You have faith that there is one God . You do well . Even the demons have that faith , and they shudder .
59 002 020	Are you willing to learn , O vacant-minded man , that faith without works is useless ?
59 002 021	Was not Abraham , our father , pronounced righteous because of works when he laid Isaac his son on the altar ?
59 002 022	You see that faith worked with his works , and by works faith was made perfect
59 002 023	and the Scripture was fulfilled which says , " Abraham had faith in God and it was credited to him for righteousness " and he was called " God's friend . "
59 002 024	You see that a man is pronounced righteous because of works and not because of faith alone .
59 002 025	In the same way was not Rahab , the prostitute , pronounced righteous because of works when she had received the messengers and sent them out by a different road ?
59 002 026	For as the body without the spirit is dead , so faith without works is dead .
59 003 001	DO not , many of you , become teachers , my brethren , for you know that we will receive severer judgment .
59 003 002	For in many ways we all stumble . If any one never stumbles in his talk , he is a perfect man , able to bridle also the whole body .
59 003 003	If we put bits into the horses ' mouths to make them obey us , we turn about their whole bodies .
59 003 004	See the ships ; great as they are and driven by violent winds , they are turned about by a very small rudder wherever the desire of the helmsman chooses .
59 003 005	Just so the tongue is a small member , but boasts of great things . Think how small a fire may be and yet how vast the forest that it may set ablaze .

59 003 006	And the tongue is a fire , a world of wickedness . The tongue stands among our members as that which spots the whole body and sets on fire the wheel of nature and is itself set on fire by Gehenna .
59 003 007	For every kind of wild beasts and birds and reptiles and animals from the sea is tamed and has been tamed by human kind ,
59 003 008	but the tongue no man is able to tame . It is a restless evil ; it is full of deadly poison .
59 003 009	With it we bless the Lord our Father and with it we curse the men who are made in the image of God .
59 003 010	From the same mouth come blessing and cursing . This , my brethren , should not be so .
59 003 011	Does a spring pour out from the same opening sweet water and bitter ?
59 003 012	Can a fig tree , my brethren , bear olives , or a vine figs ? No more can salt water yield fresh water .
59 003 013	Who is wise and intelligent among you ? Let him show out of the noble life that he lives his works in wise gentleness .
59 003 014	But if you have bitter jealousy and party-spirit in your hearts , do not boast and falsely contradict the truth .
59 003 015	This wisdom does not come down from on high , but is earthly , animal , demoniacal .
59 003 016	For where jealousy and party-spirit are , there is confusion and every base affair .
59 003 017	But the wisdom from on high is first pure , then peaceable , fair-minded , easily persuaded , full of compassion and good fruits , impartial , sincere .
59 003 018	The fruit of righteousness is sown in peace by those who make peace .
59 004 001	WHENCE come wars and whence come strifes among you ? Is it not from your pleasures which carry on war in your members ?
59 004 002	You long for something and do not have it . You murder and envy and cannot obtain it . You battle and war . You do not have , because of your not asking .
59 004 003	You ask and do not receive , because you ask wickedly to waste it on your pleasures .
59 004 004	You adulteresses , do you not know that the friendship of the world is enmity to God ? Whoever chooses to be a friend to the world stands as an enemy of God .
59 004 005	Do you think that the Scripture speaks to no purpose ? Does the Spirit which he made dwell in us long enviously ?
59 004 006	But he gives greater grace . Therefore it says , " God opposes the proud , but gives grace to the humble . "
59 004 007	Submit yourselves , then , to God . Resist the Devil and he will flee from you .
59 004 008	Draw near to God and he will draw near to you . Make your hands clean , you sinners , and purify your hearts , you double-minded .
59 004 009	Be sorrowful and mourn and lament . Let your laughter be turned into grief and your gladness into gloom .
59 004 010	Humble yourselves before the Lord and he will exalt you .

59 004 011	Do not speak against one another , brethren . He who speaks against his brother speaks against the law and judges the law . But if you judge the law you are not a doer of the law , but a judge .
59 004 012	One is the Lawgiver and Judge — he who is able to save and to destroy . Who are you , to judge your neighbor ?
59 004 013	Come , now , you who say , " To-day or to-morrow we will go to such a city and spend a year and do business and make money , "
59 004 014	though you do not know what your life will be like on the morrow . For you are a vapor that appears for a little while and then disappears .
59 004 015	You should rather say , " If the Lord wills it , we shall live and do this or that . "
59 004 016	But now you glory in bragging . All such glorying is evil .
59 004 017	If any one , then , knows how to do good and is not doing it , he is committing sin .
59 005 001	COME , now , you rich men , wail and lament over the miseries that are coming upon you .
59 005 002	Your riches have rotted and your garments have become moth-eaten ,
59 005 003	your gold and silver are rusted over and the rust on them will be an evidence against you and will eat your flesh like fire .

59 005 004	You have laid up treasures in the last days . See , the wages of the laborers who reaped your fields , fraudulently kept back by you , call aloud , and the cries of the harvesters have come into the ears of the Lord of armies .
59 005 005	You have lived luxuriously in the land and have given yourselves up to pleasure . You have fattened your hearts in a day of slaughter .
59 005 006	You have condemned , you have murdered , the righteous ; he does not resist you .

59 005 007	Therefore be patient , brethren , until the coming of the Lord . See how the farmer waits for the precious fruit of the ground and is patient over it until he receives the early and the late rains .
59 005 008	You too must be patient . Keep your hearts steadfast , for the coming of the Lord is near .
59 005 009	Do not fret at one another , brethren , and then you will not be judged . The Judge is standing before your doors .
59 005 010	Take , brethren , the prophets who spoke in the name of the Lord as an example of patience in suffering evil .
59 005 011	We call them blessed because they endured . You have heard of the patience of Job and have seen the end of the Lord's dealings with him , that the Lord is very tender and compassionate .
59 005 012	Above all things , my brethren , do not swear , either by heaven or by the earth or by any other oath . Let your yes be yes and your no be no , that you may not fall under condemnation .
59 005 013	Is any one of you suffering hardship ? Let him pray . Is any one cheerful ? Let him sing with the harp .
59 005 014	Is any one of you sick ? Let him call in the elders of the church and let them pray over him and anoint him with olive oil in the name of the Lord .
59 005 015	The prayer of faith will save the sick and the Lord will raise him up , and if he has committed sins they will be forgiven him .
59 005 016	Confess your sins to one another and pray for one another in order to be healed . The effective prayer of a righteous man has great power .
59 005 017	Elijah was a man of the same weaknesses as ours , and he prayed earnestly that it might not rain and it did not rain on the land for three years and six months .
59 005 018	Then he prayed again and heaven gave rain and the land brought forth its fruits .
59 005 019	My brethren , if one of you strays from the truth and any one brings him back ,
59 005 020	I wish you to know that he who brings back a sinner from his wanderings will save his soul from death and will hide a host of sins .
60 001 001	PETER , an apostle of Jesus Christ , to the Chosen Ones of the scattered Jews in foreign lands who are living in Pontus , Galatia , Cappadocia , Asia and Bithynia —
60 001 002	chosen according to the foreknowledge of God the Father and made holy by the Spirit to obey Jesus Christ and be sprinkled with his blood : Grace be to you and peace be multiplied .

60 001 003	Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , who according to his great mercy has given us a new birth into a living hope through the resurrection of Jesus Christ from the dead —
60 001 004	a birth into an inheritance immortal , unstained and unfading , kept in heaven for you
60 001 005	who are guarded by the power of God through faith for the salvation which is ready to be revealed on the last day .
60 001 006	In this you rejoice , though now for a little while , if necessary , you are sorrowful in trials of many kinds ,
60 001 007	so that your tested faith , much more precious than gold that perishes though tested by fire , may be found to your praise and glory and honor when Jesus Christ is revealed ,
60 001 008	whom you love though you have not seen him ; in whom you have faith though now you do not see him , and you rejoice with unspeakable and glorious joy
60 001 009	while you receive the reward of your faith , the salvation of your souls .
60 001 010	Regarding this salvation the prophets who foretold the grace that was to come to you

60 001 011	inquired and searched , trying to find out what time , or what sort of time , the Spirit of Christ which was in them was disclosing when it witnessed beforehand regarding the sufferings of Christ and the glories to follow .

60 001 012	It was revealed to them that they were serving not themselves but you , in these things which now have been announced to you through those who have told you the good news by the Holy Spirit sent forth from heaven — things which angels earnestly long to look into .
60 001 013	Therefore brace up your minds , be calm and set your hope perfectly on the grace that is to be brought to you when Jesus Christ is revealed .
60 001 014	As obedient children , do not shape your lives by the passions that ruled you in the former days of ignorance ,
60 001 015	but , like the Holy One who has called you , become yourselves holy in all your way of life ,
60 001 016	for it is written , " You shall be holy because I am holy . "
60 001 017	And if you call upon him as Father who impartially judges by each one's work , live out the time of your sojourn here in reverence ,
60 001 018	for you know that you were not ransomed with perishable things , silver or gold , from your purposeless life handed down from your forefathers ,
60 001 019	but by precious blood , as of a faultless , spotless lamb , the blood of Christ ,
60 001 020	who was foreknown before the foundation of the world , but was manifested at the end of time for your sake
60 001 021	who through him are faithful to God , who raised him from the dead and gave him glory , so that your faith and hope are in God .
60 001 022	Now that you have made your souls holy by obedience to the truth for sincere brotherly love , you must love one another steadily from your hearts ,
60 001 023	for you have been reborn , not from mortal seed but from immortal by the living and enduring word of God .
60 001 024	For " All flesh is like grass and all its glory is like the flower of the grass ; the grass withers and the flower falls ,
60 001 025	but the word of the Lord endures forever . " And this is the word of good news that has been brought to you .
60 002 001	THEN lay aside all malice and all deceit and hypocrisy and envy and every kind of slander ,
60 002 002	and , like new-born babes , long for the reasonable pure milk , that by it you may grow up into salvation ,
60 002 003	if you have tasted that the Lord is kind .
60 002 004	Coming to him , a living stone , rejected by men but with the Lord chosen and precious ,
60 002 005	you also as living stones are built up , a spiritual house , and become a holy priesthood to offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ .
60 002 006	Therefore it is contained in Scripture , " See , I am laying in Zion a chosen stone , an honored corner stone . He who has faith in him will not be put to shame . "
60 002 007	To you who have faith is the " honor , " but to the unbelieving " the stone which the builders rejected — that has become the corner stone ,
60 002 008	a stone for the foot to strike , a rock to stumble over . " Their feet strike the message because of their unbelief , and to this they were destined .
60 002 009	But you are a chosen race , a kingly priesthood , a holy nation , God's own people , that you may proclaim the virtues of him who called you from darkness into his wonderful light .
60 002 010	Once you were not a people , but now you are the people of God : once you had not found compassion , but now you have found compassion .
60 002 011	Beloved , I beg you , as foreigners and resident aliens , to shun the passions of the flesh which war against the soul .

60 002 012	Keep your daily life among the Gentiles honorable , so that , although they talk against you as if you were wrongdoers , they may , from your noble deeds that they see , glorify God on the day of inspection .
60 002 013	Be submissive to every human institution for the Lord's sake , whether to the king as supreme ,
60 002 014	or to governors as those sent by him for the punishment of wrongdoers and the praise of those who do good .
60 002 015	For this is the will of God — that by doing good we shall silence the ignorance of thoughtless men .
60 002 016	Live as free men , yet not using freedom as a cloak for wickedness , but as God's slaves .
60 002 017	Honor all men , love the brotherhood , reverence God , honor the king .
60 002 018	Household servants , be submissive with all reverence to your lords , not only to the good and fair , but also to the surly .
60 002 019	For this is grace if for conscience toward God any one bears pain , suffering unjustly .
60 002 020	For what credit is it if when you sin and are struck with the fist you are patient ? But if though doing well , you suffer and are patient , that is grace in God's sight .
60 002 021	For to this you were called , because Christ too suffered for you , leaving you an example that you might follow in his foot-steps .
60 002 022	He had done no sin , nor was deceit found in his mouth .
60 002 023	When he was reviled he did not revile back ; he suffered , but made no threat ; he committed himself to him who judges justly .
60 002 024	He bore our sins in his own body on the tree that we might die to sins and live to righteousness .
60 002 025	For you were going astray like sheep , but have now returned to the shepherd and guardian of your souls .
60 003 001	IN the same way you wives are to be submissive to your own husbands , so that if any disbelieve the message they may be won over by the lives of their wives without argument ,
60 003 002	when they look at your pure , reverential behavior .
60 003 003	Your adornment must not be of the external kind — braiding the hair and putting on gold and wearing fine dresses ;
60 003 004	but the hidden personality of the heart must wear the imperishable beauty of a gentle and quiet spirit , which is in God's sight most precious .
60 003 005	For so of old the holy women who hoped in God adorned themselves . They were submissive to their own husbands ,
60 003 006	as Sarah obeyed Abraham and called him Master . You have become her children when you do well and feel no terror .

60 003 007	In the same way , you husbands must live with your wives wisely , since woman's sex is weaker , but you must give them honor as fellow heirs of the grace of life , so that your prayers may not be hindered .
60 003 008	Finally , all must be like-minded , sympathetic , full of brotherly love , compassionate , humble-minded ,
60 003 009	not repaying evil for evil or abuse for abuse , but rather blessing , for that is what you were called for — to inherit a blessing .
60 003 010	For " He who would love life and see good days must keep his tongue from evil and his lips from speaking deceit .
60 003 011	He must turn away from evil and do good ; he must seek peace and pursue it .
60 003 012	For the eyes of the Lord are upon the righteous and his ears are open to their prayer , but the face of the Lord is against wrongdoers . "
60 003 013	And who is it that will harm you if you become earnest for the good ?
60 003 014	But if you should suffer for being righteous , you are blessed . Have no fear of them and do not be disturbed ;
60 003 015	but exalt Christ as Lord in your hearts and be always ready to defend yourselves to every one who asks you to give account of the hope that is in you , yet with gentleness and reverence .
60 003 016	Keep a good conscience that , although you are slandered , those who misrepresent your good life in Christ may be put to shame .
60 003 017	For it is better to suffer , if that should be God's will , for doing good than for doing wrong .
60 003 018	For Christ once for all died for sins , a righteous man for unrighteous men , so that he might lead us to God . He was put to death in the flesh , but made alive in the spirit ,
60 003 019	in which he went and made proclamation to the imprisoned spirits

60 003 020	who were once disobedient , when the long-suffering of God waited in the days of Noah while the ark was being prepared , into which a few , that is eight souls , went and were saved through water .
60 003 021	This is a type of baptism , which now saves us — not the putting off of soil from the flesh , but the endeavor for a good conscience toward God through the resurrection of Jesus Christ .
60 003 022	Now that he has gone into heaven he is at the right hand of God , and angels and authorities and powers have been made subject to him .
60 004 001	SINCE , then , Christ suffered in the flesh , you also must arm yourselves with the same mind . For he who has suffered in the flesh has ceased from sin ,
60 004 002	so that he does not go on living what remains of his time in the flesh according to human passions , but according to God's will .
60 004 003	The time that has passed was enough to spend doing the will of the Gentiles , when you went on in indecencies , passions , hard drinking , revelries , carousings , and lawless idolatries .
60 004 004	In these they think it strange that you are not running with them to the same excess of profligacy , and they slander you .
60 004 005	But they will have to give account to him who holds himself ready to judge the living and the dead .
60 004 006	And for this purpose the good news was told even to the dead , that they might be judged like men in the flesh , but live as God does in the spirit .
60 004 007	The end of all things is near . Therefore be serious and sober and give yourselves to prayer .
60 004 008	Above all things have earnest love to one another , for love hides a host of sins .
60 004 009	Be hospitable to one another without grumbling .
60 004 010	Let each , as he has received a spiritual gift , serve the others in that way , as good stewards of the varied grace of God .

60 004 011	If any one speaks , let it be as uttering the oracles of God . If any one serves , let it be from the strength that God supplies . Thus in all things let God be glorified through Jesus Christ . To him be glory and strength for the ages of the ages ! Amen .
60 004 012	Beloved , do not be surprised at the fiery fury that is among you , which has come to try you , as if some strange thing were happening to you .
60 004 013	But rejoice since to this extent you are sharing the sufferings of Christ , that when his glory is revealed you may rejoice and exult .
60 004 014	If you are reproached for the name of Christ you are blessed , for the spirit of glory and of God rests upon you .
60 004 015	No one of you must suffer as a murderer or as a thief or as a wrongdoer or as a meddler in other men's affairs .
60 004 016	But if he suffers as a Christian he should not be ashamed , but should glorify God by that name .
60 004 017	For the time has come for judgment to begin at the house of God . And if it begins first with us , what will be the end of those who disobey the good news of God ?
60 004 018	If the righteous is saved with difficulty , where will the godless and sinful appear ?
60 004 019	So then let those who are suffering according to the will of God commit their souls in well-doing to a faithful Creator .
60 005 001	THE elders among you I beg — I who am a fellow elder and a witness to the sufferings of Christ and a sharer in the glory soon to be revealed —
60 005 002	I beg you to shepherd the flock of God that is among you , not because you must , but willingly , not for base gain , but eagerly ,
60 005 003	not lording it over your charges , but becoming examples to the flock .
60 005 004	Then when the chief Shepherd appears you will be repaid with the never-fading crown of glory .

60 005 005	In the same way you younger men must be subject to your elders . You all must put on the apron of humble service for one another . For God opposes the proud , but gives grace to the humble .
60 005 006	Humble yourselves , then , under the mighty hand of God so that he may lift you up at the right time .
60 005 007	Cast all your anxiety on him , for he cares for you .
60 005 008	Be sober , watch . Your enemy the Devil , like a roaring lion , goes about seeking some one to devour .
60 005 009	Resist him firm in the faith and knowing that the same experiences of suffering are being completed in your brotherhood throughout the world .
60 005 010	The God of all grace , who called you to his eternal glory in Christ , after you have suffered a little will equip , establish and strengthen you .
60 005 011	To him be power for the ages of the ages ! Amen .
60 005 012	By Silvanus , your faithful brother , as I esteem him , I am writing to you briefly , to encourage you and to testify that this is the true grace of God . Take your stand in it .
60 005 013	She who is in Babylon , chosen with you , sends her greeting to you , and so does Mark my son .
60 005 014	Salute one another with a kiss of love . Peace be to you all in Christ .
61 001 001	SIMON PETER , a servant and apostle of Jesus Christ , to those who by the righteousness of our God and Savior Jesus Christ have been allotted a faith as precious as ours :
61 001 002	Grace be to you and peace be multiplied in the knowledge of God and of Jesus our Lord .
61 001 003	Since his divine power has given us all things helpful to life and piety through the knowledge of him who has called us by his own glory and virtue ,

61 001 004	and thereby great and precious promises have been granted to us , that through them you may escape the corruption that is in the world through passion and become sharers in the divine nature ,
61 001 005	for this very reason make it your whole endeavor to supply to your faith virtue , and to your virtue knowledge ,
61 001 006	and to your knowledge self-control , and to your self-control endurance , and to your endurance reverence ,
61 001 007	and to your reverence brotherliness , and to your brotherliness love .
61 001 008	For when you have these in abundance they make you to be neither idle nor fruitless regarding the knowledge of our Lord Jesus Christ .
61 001 009	But he who lacks these is blind , dim-sighted , and has forgotten that he was cleansed from his former sins .
61 001 010	Therefore endeavor more earnestly , brethren , to make sure that you have been called and chosen . For while doing these things you will never stumble .
61 001 011	For so entrance into the eternal kingdom of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ will be richly provided for you .
61 001 012	For this reason I shall always keep reminding you of these things , although you know them and are steadfast in the truth that you have .
61 001 013	I think it right so long as I am in this tent to arouse you by reminding you ,
61 001 014	since I know that the laying aside of my tent will come soon , as our Lord Jesus Christ has made plain to me .
61 001 015	I will endeavor also on every occasion to make it so that after my going you shall have these things in memory .
61 001 016	For we were not following cunningly devised myths when we told you of the power and coming of our Lord Jesus Christ , but we had been eye-witnesses of his majesty .
61 001 017	For he received from God the Father honor and glory when such words as these were borne to him from the majestic glory , " This is my Son , the Beloved ; in him I delight . "
61 001 018	And this voice we heard borne from heaven when we were with him on the holy mountain .

61 001 019	Thus have we the words of the prophets confirmed , and you will do well to give attention to them as to a lamp shining in a dark place , until the day dawns and the morning star rises in your hearts ;
61 001 020	since you know this first , that no prophecy of Scripture comes from any one's private interpretation ,
61 001 021	for prophecy never came by the will of man , but men spoke from God as they were moved by the Holy Spirit .

61 002 001	BUT false prophets also arose among the people , just as there will be false teachers among yourselves , and they will craftily bring in deadly heresies , even disowning the Lord who bought them and bringing on themselves quick ruin .
61 002 002	Many will follow their shameless ways and by these the path of truth will be profanely spoken of .
61 002 003	In covetousness they will make gain out of you by their cunning words . But their condemnation from of old has not been inactive , and their destruction has not been sleeping .
61 002 004	For if God did not spare angels that had sinned , but thrust them down to Tartarus and committed them to pits of darkness to be kept for judgment ,
61 002 005	and did not spare the ancient world , but guarded Noah , a herald of righteousness , and seven others , when he brought the flood on the world of the ungodly ;
61 002 006	and if reducing to ashes the cities of Sodom and Gomorrah he condemned them to destruction , making them an example for the godless of what would come upon them ,
61 002 007	and rescued righteous Lot worn out by the indecent lives of the lawless , —
61 002 008	for that righteous man living among them was tortured day and night in his righteous soul by the sight and hearing of their lawless deeds , —
61 002 009	the Lord knows how to rescue the pious from trial and how to keep the wicked under punishment for the day of judgment ,
61 002 010	especially those who go after flesh in polluting passions , and despise lordship . They are daring , self-willed ; they do not tremble to speak insultingly of glorious beings
61 002 011	even where angels greater in strength and power do not bring against them an insulting charge before the Lord .
61 002 012	But they , like irrational creatures , born mere animals for capture and destruction , while speaking profanely of things they are ignorant of , will be corrupted by their own corruption ,

61 002 013	and will suffer unrighteously as the reward of their own unrighteousness . They think it pleasure to revel in the daytime . They are spots and blots as they revel in their deceptions while they feast sumptuously with you .
61 002 014	They have eyes engrossed with some adulteress , eyes which never cease from sin . They seduce unsteady souls . They have hearts practiced in covetousness . They are children of a curse .
61 002 015	Leaving the straight path they have wandered away following the path of Balaam the son of Beor , who loved the wages of unrighteousness .
61 002 016	But he was reproved for his sin ; a dumb beast of draught , speaking with human voice , checked the madness of the prophet .
61 002 017	These men are springs without water , storm-driven mists for whom the blackness of darkness is reserved .
61 002 018	For by speaking great empty swelling words they entrap in the passions of the flesh — wanton excesses — those who are nearly escaping from those who live in error .
61 002 019	While they promise them liberty they themselves are the slaves of corruption ; for by whatever any one is overcome to that he is enslaved .

61 002 020	For if , after they have escaped the defilement of the world by the knowledge of the Lord and Savior Jesus Christ , they have been again entangled and overcome , their last state has become worse than the first .
61 002 021	For it would be better for them not to have known the way of righteousness than after knowing it to turn back from the holy commandment that has been committed to them .
61 002 022	That has happened to them which the true proverb says , " The dog returns to his own vomit and the sow after bathing returns to wallowing in the mire . "
61 003 001	THIS second letter , beloved , I am writing you . In both I have tried , by awakening your memory ,
61 003 002	to arouse your honest minds to recall the predictions of the holy prophets and the commands of your apostles from the Lord and Savior .
61 003 003	First you should know this , that in the last days scoffers will come with their scoffing , living according to their own passions
61 003 004	and saying , " Where is his promised coming ? for since the fathers fell asleep all things remain as they have been since the beginning of the creation ? "
61 003 005	For they willfully forget that there were heavens of old and an earth formed out of water and through water by God's word .
61 003 006	By these means the world that then was was flooded with water and destroyed .
61 003 007	But the present heavens and the earth are by the same word treasured up and kept for fire on the day of judgment and destruction of ungodly men .
61 003 008	Do not forget this one thing , beloved , that one day with the Lord is like a thousand years and a thousand years are like one day .
61 003 009	The Lord is not slow about what he has promised , as some think of slowness , but is long-suffering toward us , wishing not to have any perish but to have all come to a change of heart .

61 003 010	But the day of the Lord will come like a thief . On that day the heavens will pass away with a loud noise and the burning elements will be dissolved and the earth and the things in it will not be found .
61 003 011	Since all of these things are to be dissolved , what sort of persons ought you to be in holy lives and piety ,
61 003 012	you who are looking for and hastening toward the coming of the day of God , when the blazing heavens will be dissolved and the burning elements melted ?
61 003 013	But according to his promise we are expecting new heavens and a new earth in which righteousness will dwell .
61 003 014	Therefore , beloved , since you expect this , endeavor earnestly to be found by him in peace , spotless and faultless ,
61 003 015	and regard the long-suffering of our Lord as salvation , as also our beloved brother Paul has written to you , according to the wisdom given to him .

61 003 016	So he writes in all his letters when speaking in them of these things . In those letters are some things hard to understand , and these the unlearned and unsteady twist , as they do the rest of the Scriptures , to their own ruin .
61 003 017	You , then , beloved , since you know these things beforehand , be on your guard not to be led away by the error of the lawless and fall from your own steadfastness ,
61 003 018	but grow in grace and in knowledge of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ . To him be glory now and to the day of eternity !
62 001 001	WHAT was from the beginning , what we have heard , what we have seen with our eyes , what we looked upon and our hands touched — it is about the Word of Life
62 001 003	what wo have seen and heard we are telling you also , so that you may have fellowship with us . And our fellowship is with the Father and with his Son Jesus Christ .
62 001 004	We are writing this that our joy may be complete .
62 001 005	This is the message which we have heard from him and tell to you , God is light and in him is no darkness at all .
62 001 006	If we say , " We have fellowship with him , " and live in darkness , we lie and are not acting the truth .
62 001 007	If we live in the light , as he is in the light , we have fellowship with one another and the blood of Jesus his Son cleanses us from all sin .
62 001 008	If we say , " We have no sin , " we deceive ourselves and the truth is not in us .
62 001 009	If we confess our sins , he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins and cleanse us from all unrighteousness :
62 001 010	If we say , " We have not sinned , " we make him a liar and his message is not in us .
62 002 001	MY children , I am writing this to you in order that you may not sin . Even if any one sins , we have an advocate with the Father , Jesus Christ , who is righteous .
62 002 002	And he is an atoning sacrifice for our sins , and not for ours only but for those of the whole world .
62 002 003	By this we know that we have come to know him , if we keep his commands .
62 002 004	He who says , " I know him , " and does not keep his commands , is a liar and truth is not in him .
62 002 005	But whoever keeps his word , truly in him the love of God has been made perfect . By this we know that we are in him .
62 002 006	He who says that he is abiding in him ought himself to live as he lived .
62 002 007	Beloved , I am not writing a new command for you , but an old command , which you have had from the beginning . The old command is the message that you have heard .
62 002 008	Again I am writing a new command , which is true in him and in you , because the darkness is passing away and the true Light is already shining .
62 002 009	He who says that he is in the light and hates his brother is in darkness still .
62 002 010	He who loves his brother remains in the light and there is no stumbling block in him .
62 002 011	He who hates his brother is in darkness and walks in darkness and knows not where he is going , because the darkness has blinded his eyes .
62 002 012	I am writing to you , little children , because your sins have been forgiven for his name's sake .

62 002 013	I am writing to you , fathers , because you have come to know him who has been from the beginning . I am writing to you , young men , because you have conquered the Evil One . I have written to you , little children , because you have come to know the Father .

62 002 014	I have written to you , fathers , because you have come to know him who has been from the beginning . I have written to you , young men , because you are strong and the message of God remains in you and you have conquered the Evil One .
62 002 015	Do not love the world nor the things that are in the world . If any one loves the world , the love of the Father is not in him ;
62 002 016	for all that is in the world , the passions of the flesh and the lust of the eyes and the show and pride of life , is not from the Father , but from the world .
62 002 017	And the world is passing away with its passions . But he who does the will of God endures forever .
62 002 018	Little children , it is the last hour , and as you have heard that Antichrist is coming , even now many Antichrists have arisen . By this we know that it is the last hour .
62 002 019	They went out from us , but they were not of us , for if they had been of us they would have continued with us . But they went out so that it might be plainly seen that not all are of us .
62 002 020	You have an anointing from the Holy One and you all know .
62 002 021	I am not writing to you because you do not know the truth , but because you know it and know that no lie is from the truth .
62 002 022	Who is a liar but he who denies that Jesus is the Christ ? He is the Antichrist who denies the Father and the Son .
62 002 023	No one who denies the Son has the Father either . He who confesses the Son has the Father also .
62 002 024	Let what you have heard from the beginning remain in you . If what you have heard from the beginning remains in you , you also will remain in the Son and in the Father .
62 002 025	And this is the promise that he has promised us — the life eternal .
62 002 026	I am writing this to you in regard to those who are misleading you .

62 002 027	But as for you , the anointing that you have received from him remains in you and you have no need for any one to teach you , but as his anointing teaches you about all things and is true and is no lie and as it has taught you , you must remain in him .
62 002 028	And now , little children , remain in him so that if he appears we may have confidence and not shrink in shame from him at his coming .
62 002 029	If you know that he is righteous , you know that every one who does righteousness has been born of him .
62 003 001	SEE what love the Father has bestowed on us that we should be called children of God . And so we are . The reason why tho world does not know us is that it did not know him .
62 003 002	Beloved , we are now children of God and it is not yet plain what we shall be . But we know that if he appears we shall be like him , for we shall see him as he is .
62 003 003	And every one who has this hope set upon Christ purifies himself just as Christ is pure .
62 003 004	Every one who commits sin commits also lawlessness ; for sin is lawlessness .
62 003 005	You know that Christ appeared to take away sins and in him there is no sin .
62 003 006	Whoever remains in him does not sin ; whoever sins has not seen him nor known him .
62 003 007	Little children , let no one deceive you . He who is doing righteousness is righteous as Christ is righteous .
62 003 008	He who is committing sin is of the Devil , for the Devil has been sinning from the beginning . For this the Son of God appeared — to undo the works of the Devil .
62 003 009	No one who has been born of God commits sin , for God's life-giving germ remains in him and he cannot continue sinning , because he has been born of God .
62 003 010	By this the children of God are plain to see , also the children of the Devil . Every one who is not doing righteousness is not of God , nor is he who does not love his brother .
62 003 011	For this is the message which you have heard from the beginning , that we must love one another .
62 003 012	Not like Cain , who was of the Wicked One and killed his brother . And for what reason did he kill him ? Because his own deeds were wicked and his brother's righteous .
62 003 013	Do not be surprised , brethren , if the world hates you .
62 003 014	We know that we have passed from death into life because we love the brethren . Whoever does not love remains in death .
62 003 015	Every one who hates his brother is a murderer , and you know that no murderer has life eternal remaining in him .
62 003 016	By this we have come to know love — that Christ laid down his life for us , and we ought to lay down our lives for the brethren .
62 003 017	But if any one has this world's goods and sees his brother in need and shuts away his sympathies from him , how can the love of God remain in him ?
62 003 018	Let us not love in word or in tongue , but in deed and in truth .
62 003 019	By this we shall know that we are of the truth and shall give confidence to our hearts in his presence ,
62 003 020	because if our hearts condemn us God is greater than our hearts and knows all things .
62 003 021	Beloved , if our hearts do not condemn us we have confidence toward God ,
62 003 022	and whatever we ask we receive from him , because we keep his commands and do what is pleasing in his sight .
62 003 023	And this is his command — to believe in the name of his Son Jesus Christ and love one another as he has given us command .
62 003 024	He who keeps his commands remains in God and God remains in him . By this we know that God remains in us — by the Spirit which he has given to us .
62 004 001	BELOVED , do not trust every spirit , but test the spirits whether they are from God . For many false prophets have come out into the world .
62 004 002	By this we know the Spirit of God : every spirit that confesses that Jesus Christ has come in the flesh is from God ,
62 004 003	and no spirit that does not confess Jesus is from God . This is the spirit of Antichrist , which you have heard is coming into the world and is already in the world .
62 004 004	But you are of God , little children , and have conquered them , because he who is in us is greater than he who is in the world .
62 004 005	They belong to the world and for that reason they speak as the world speaks and the world listens to them .
62 004 006	We are of God . Whoever knows God listens to us : whoever is not of God does not listen to us . In this way we know the spirit of truth and the spirit of error .
62 004 007	Beloved , let us love one another , for love is from God , and every one who loves has been born of God and knows God .
62 004 008	He who does not love does not know God ; for God is love .
62 004 009	By this the love of God to us was made plain : that God sent his only Son into the world so that we may have life through him .
62 004 010	In this is love — not that we loved God , but that he loved us and sent his Son to be an atoning sacrifice for our sins .
62 004 011	Beloved , if God has so loved us , we ought also to love one another .
62 004 012	No one has ever seen God . If we love one another God abides in us and his love is made perfect in us .
62 004 013	By this we know that we abide in him and he in us , because he has imparted to us of his Spirit .
62 004 014	We have seen and we bear witness that the Father has sent the Son to be the Savior of the world .
62 004 015	Whoever confesses that Jesus is the Son of God , God abides in him and he in God .
62 004 016	We have come to know and have put our trust in the love which God has for us . God is love , and he who remains in love remains in God and God remains in him .
62 004 017	Thus love has been made perfect with us so that we may have confidence on the day of judgment , because as God is we also are in this world .
62 004 018	There is no fear in love , but perfect love casts out fear , because fear has pain . He who fears has not been made perfect in love .
62 004 019	We love because he first loved us .
62 004 020	If any one says , " I love God , " and hates his brother , he is a liar . For he who does not love his brother whom he has seen cannot love God whom he has not seen .
62 004 021	This command we have from him , that he who loves God shall love his brother also .
62 005 001	EVERY one who believes that Jesus is the Christ has been born of God , and every one who loves the father who gave him life loves every one who has received life from that father .
62 005 002	By this we know that we love the children of God , when we love God and do his commands .
62 005 003	For this is the love of God , our keeping his commands . And his commands are not burden-some ,
62 005 004	because all that is born of God conquers the world . And this is the victory that conquers the world , our faith .
62 005 005	Who is the conqueror of the world but he who believes that Jesus is the Son of God ?
62 005 006	This is he who came through water and blood , Jesus Christ . Not with the water only , but with the water and the blood . And the Spirit is the witness , because the Spirit is the truth .
62 005 008	For there are three that bear witness , the Spirit and the water and the blood , and the three are in accord .
62 005 009	If we accept the testimony of men the testimony of God is greater ; for this is God's testimony , that he has testified regarding his Son .

62 005 010	He who believes in the Son of God has the testimony within himself . He who does not believe God has made him a liar ; because he has not believed the testimony which God has borne regarding his Son .
62 005 011	This is the testimony : that God has given to us life eternal and this life is in his Son .
62 005 012	He who has the Son has life ; he who has not the Son of God has not life .
62 005 013	I am writing this to you so that you may know that you have life eternal , you who believe in the name of the Son of God .
62 005 014	This is the confidence that we have toward him : that if we ask anything according to his will he hears us .
62 005 015	And if we know that he hears us when we ask anything , we know that we obtain the things that we have asked of him .

62 005 016	If any one sees his brother committing a sin that is not deadly , he must ask and God will give him life for those who are committing sin that is not deadly . There is sin that is deadly . I do not say that he should pray in behalf of that .
62 005 017	All unrighteousness is sin , and there is sin that is not deadly .
62 005 018	We know that every one who has been born of God lives without sinning , but he who was born of God keeps him , and the Evil One does not lay hold of him .
62 005 019	We know that we are of God and the whole world lies in the Evil One .

62 005 020	We know that the Son of God has come and has given us understanding to know him who is true , and we are in him who is true and in his Son , Jesus Christ . This is the true God and life eternal .
62 005 021	Little children , guard yourselves from idols .
63 001 001	THE Elder to the chosen Lady and her children , whom I love in truth
63 001 002	for the sake of the truth which remains in us and will be with us forever :
63 001 003	Grace , mercy , and peace will be with us from God the Father and from Jesus Christ , the Son of the Father , in truth and love .
63 001 004	I rejoiced greatly to find some of your children living in truth , as we received command from the Father .
63 001 005	And now I pray you , Lady , not as if writing a new command for you , but one that we have had from the beginning , let us love one another .
63 001 006	This is love : to live by his commands . This is the command , as you heard from the beginning that you must live by it .
63 001 007	For many deceivers have come out into the world and they do not confess that Jesus Christ has come in the flesh . Such a one is the deceiver and the Antichrist .
63 001 008	Guard yourselves so as not to lose what we have worked for , but so that you may gain a full reward .
63 001 009	Every one who goes forward and does not remain in the teaching of Christ is without God . He who remains in the teaching , he has the Father and the Son .
63 001 010	If any one comes to you and does not bring this teaching , do not take him into your house and do not bid him welcome .
63 001 011	He who bids him welcome becomes a sharer in his wicked works .
63 001 012	I have much to write to you , but I will not do it with paper and ink . I hope to be with you soon and to speak face to face so that our joy may be complete .
63 001 013	The children of your chosen sister send greetings to you .
64 001 001	THE Elder to Gaius the beloved , whom I love in truth :
64 001 002	Beloved , I pray that in everything you may prosper and be in health , just as your soul now prospers .
64 001 003	For I rejoiced greatly when brethren came and testified to your truth — that you are living in the truth .
64 001 004	I have no greater joy than this : to hear that my children are living in the truth .
64 001 005	Beloved , you do faithfully whatever work you do for the brethren , even when they are strangers ,
64 001 006	and they have testified to your love before the church . You will do well to help them forward on their journey in a manner worthy of God .
64 001 007	For it was for the Name that they came out , taking nothing from the Gentiles .
64 001 008	We ought to help such men so as to be fellow workers with the truth .
64 001 009	I wrote something to the church ; but Diotrephes , who desires to be first among them , does not receive us .

64 001 010	Therefore , if I come I will bring to mind the works that he is doing , accusing us with wicked words , and not satisfied with that , neither does he receive the brethren , and he hinders those who wish to do so and expels them from the church .
64 001 011	Beloved , do not imitate evil , but good . He who does good is of God . He who does evil has not seen God .
64 001 012	Testimony has been borne to Demetrius by all and by the truth itself . We too bear testimony , and you know that our testimony is true .
64 001 013	I had much to write to you , but I will not write to you with ink and pen .
64 001 014	But I hope to see you shortly , and we shall speak face to face . Peace be to you . The friends send greetings to you . Greet the friends by name .
65 001 001	JUDE , a servant of Jesus Christ and a brother of James , to those who are in God the Father , beloved , kept for Jesus Christ and called :
65 001 002	Mercy and peace and love be multiplied to you .

65 001 003	Beloved , although I have been making every effort to write to you regarding our common salvation , I now find it necessary to write and urge you to contend vigorously for the faith that was once for all delivered to the holy .

65 001 004	For certain persons have crept in , who of old were written of as predestined to this doom , godless , changing the grace of our God into profligacy and disowning our only Ruler and Lord , Jesus Christ .
65 001 005	I wish to remind you , although you know all things once for all , that the Lord , after saving a people from the land of Egypt , then destroyed those who had no faith ;
65 001 006	and angels who did not keep their own rank , but left their own abode , he has kept for the judgment of the great day in everlasting chains under blackness of darkness .

65 001 007	So Sodom and Gomorrah , and the cities around them , which in the same way gave themselves up to unchastity and the pursuit of unnatural vices , serve as an example while they undergo the punishment of eternal fire .
65 001 008	Just so these dreamers defile the flesh , reject government , and speak abusively of glorious beings .

65 001 009	But Michael , the arch-angel , when in dispute with the Devil he was arguing about the body of Moses , did not venture to bring against him an abusive judgment , but said , " The Lord rebuke you . "
65 001 010	But these speak profanely of whatever they do not know , and all that physically as irrational animals they do understand , in these things they corrupt themselves .
65 001 011	Alas for them ! for they have traveled in the path of Cain , and for hire have rushed headlong into the error of Balaam , and have perished in the rebellious talk of Korah .

65 001 012	These are the hidden reefs in your love-feasts while they feast freely with you without fear , shepherds who care only for themselves , waterless clouds driven by winds , trees in autumn fruitless , twice dead , uprooted ,
65 001 013	wild waves of the sea foaming out their own shame , wandering stars for which the blackness of darkness is reserved forever .
65 001 014	Enoch , the seventh from Adam , prophesied of these men when he said , " See , the Lord has come with ten thousand of his holy ones

65 001 015	to do judgment upon all and to convict all the irreverent of all their deeds of irreverence which they have irreverently done , and of all the hard things which they have spoken against him , irreverent sinners that they are . "

65 001 016	These men are complaining grumblers , living according to their own passions , and their mouths speak great swelling words . They show admiration for persons for the sake of their own gain .
65 001 017	But you , beloved , remember the words which were long ago spoken by the apostles of our Lord Jesus Christ ,
65 001 018	how they told you that in the latter time there would be scoffers living according to their own ungodly passions .
65 001 019	These are those who cause divisions , sensual and unspiritual .
65 001 020	But you , beloved , building yourselves up in your most holy faith and praying in the Holy Spirit ,
65 001 021	must keep yourselves in the love of God , looking for the mercy of our Lord Jesus Christ to bring you into life eternal .
65 001 022	On some have pity when they are in doubt ;
65 001 023	pull them out of the fire and save them . Others pity with fear , hating even the tunic spotted by the flesh .
65 001 024	To him who is able to guard you from falling and to make you stand faultless before his glory in great joy ,
65 001 025	to the only God our Savior , be , through Jesus Christ our Lord , glory , majesty , might , and authority , before all time and now and for all the ages ! Amen .
66 001 001	A REVELATION of Jesus Christ which God gave to him , to make known to his servants things which must soon take place . He sent and made it known through his angel to his servant John ,
66 001 002	who bears witness to the message of God and the testimony of Jesus Christ — everything that he saw .
66 001 003	Blessed is he who reads , and blessed are those who hear the words of this prophecy and keep in mind what is written in it ; for the time is near .
66 001 004	John to the seven Churches in Asia : Grace be to you and peace from him who is and who was and who is to come , and from the seven Spirits that are before his throne ,
66 001 005	and from Jesus Christ , the faithful witness , the first-born of the dead , and the ruler of the kings of the earth . To him who loves us and freed us from our sins by his blood ,
66 001 006	and made us a kingdom , priests to God his Father , to him be glory and power for the ages of the ages ! Amen .

66 001 010	I became in the Spirit on the Lord's day and heard behind me a loud voice , as of a trumpet ,
66 001 011	saying , " What you see write in a book , and send it to the seven churches , to Ephesus and to Smyrna and to Pergamum and to Thyatira and to Sardis and to Philadelphia and to Laodicea . "

66 001 013	and in the midst of the lampstands one like a son of man , clothed in a robe that reached his feet , and girded across the breast with a golden girdle .
66 001 014	His head and his hair were white , like white wool , like snow , and his eyes were like a flame of fire ,
66 001 015	and his feet were like fine brass when molten in a furnace , and his voice was like the sound of many waters .
66 001 016	He had in his right hand seven stars , and from his mouth there issued a sharp two-edged sword . His face was like the sun shining in full strength .
66 001 017	When I saw him I fell at his feet as if dead . But he laid his right hand on me and said : " Do not fear . I am the first and the last
66 001 018	and the living one . I became dead , but now I am living for the ages of the ages , and I have the keys of death and of Hades .
66 001 019	Write what you have seen , and what is and what is to be hereafter —

66 001 020	the mystery of the seven stars that you saw in my right hand and the seven golden lampstands . The seven stars are angels of the seven churches , and the seven lampstands are seven churches .
66 002 001	" To the Angel of the Church in Ephesus write : " These things says he who holds the seven stars in his right hand , he who walks in the midst of the seven golden lamp-stands :

66 002 002	I know your works and your labor and your endurance , and that you cannot bear wicked people , and you have tried those who say that they are apostles though they are not , and you have found them liars .
66 002 003	You have endurance and you have borne for the sake of my name and you have not been discouraged .
66 002 004	But I have this against you , that you have lost your first love .
66 002 005	Remember then from where you have fallen , and repent and do your former works . Otherwise I am coming to you and will move your lampstand from its place , if you do not repent .
66 002 006	But you have this , that you hate the works of the Nicolaitans , which I also hate .
